quotes.text: What’s orange and sounds like a parrot? A carrot.
Today, do not use the words "Kind of", "Sort of" or "Maybe". It either is or it isn't.
I was going to go on an expensive vacation with a classical pianist, but he was too baroque.
Why did the coach go to the bank? To get his quarter back.
I'm more interested in being good than being famous.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.text: Sarcasm is the lowest form of wit. Employ correctly with apt timing.
One of the top five regrets people have is that they didn't have the courage to be their true self.
Never set an alarm clock unless you know how to switch it off
What kind of jewelry do rabbits wear? 14 carrot gold.
Why did the girl toss a clock out the window? She wanted to see time fly.
Personally, I was never the cool kid. I was always sort of a bookworm.
quotes.author: Zac Efron

quotes.text: I have a joke about immortality, and it never gets old.
Don't drink bleach.
I love dad jokes, but I don't have kids, which makes me a Faux Pa.
Things are just things. Don't get too attached to them.
What sits on the seabed and has anxiety? A nervous wreck.
To show a child what once delighted you, to find the child's delight added to your own - this is happiness.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.text: What did one plate say to another plate? Tonight, dinner's on me.
What do you call a fish with no eyes? Fsh.
Your mom and I let astrology get between us. It just Taurus apart.
Don't give a speech. Put on a show.
Do something selfless.
We’re renovating the house, and the first floor is going great, but the second floor is another story.
A guy walked into a bar, and lost the limbo contest.
One science only will one genius fit so vast is art, so narrow human wit.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: It sounds cliche, but success is your friends, your family, what you do, and if you're happy when you wake up.
quotes.author: Michael Pitt

quotes.text: Because of the lack of education on AIDS, discrimination, fear, panic, and lies surrounded me.
quotes.author: Ryan White

quotes.text: Respect other people's opinions, even when they differ from your own.
I have a joke about paper, but it’s tearable.
If you have the chance, take it!
Don't take life too seriously.
If you get stuck, try doing the opposite of what the solution requires.
If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a few payments.
Don't ever name files or folders using the word "Final".
